page.description: Change the status of a form instance

argument.name: userid
argument.description: The user id (i.e. email) of the user to whom the form instance should be assigned

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: error
property.description: *[js:true]* if there was an error (for example, an attempt was made to assign the form instance to a user not in the account)

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/ChangeFormInstanceUserId?userid=value%5fof%5fuserid" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
